message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $12,000. This is a high-quality item that I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value to you, which I understand is $15,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.

Alice, thanks for the offer.  I appreciate you coming down from your initial price, but $12,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product, which is a fair price considering the value you place on it. Let me know if you're open to that.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After considering your offer, I am willing to negotiate further. I would like to propose a price of $11,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise given the value you see in it and my valuation of the item. Please let me know if this is acceptable.
